input.description: It should successfuly upgrade BIG-IP device over BIG-IQ

Create iHealth Upload Task - F5 - BIG-IQ

scriptDescription.value: Returns the service check date from the license

scriptContent.value: tmsh show sys license | grep 'Service Check Date'

job_details.scriptDescription: Returns the service check date from the license

incoming.workflow: Run Script on BIG-IP - F5 - BIG-IQ

data_array.scriptContent: tmsh install sys license registration-key PAWHT-ETKXA-OUIZI-VQSMO-JMBOKPS add-on-keys {  QZUTTXP-STCZPNX }
